member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState
member.summary: Contains the possible states for the property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.BackgroundGoingOffline
member.summary: Indicates that the background synchronization to the offline database is in progress.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.ClientLoadFailure
member.summary: Indicates that there was a failure in loading pn_crm_for_outlook_short during pn_MS_Outlook_Short startup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.ClientVersionHigher
member.summary: Indicates that the pn_crm_for_outlook_short version is later than that on the server.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.ClientVersionLower
member.summary: Indicates that the pn_crm_for_outlook_short version is earlier than that on the server.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.Disable
member.summary: TBD

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.GoingOffline
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short is going offline.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.GoingOfflineCanceled
member.summary: Indicates that the user canceled the go offline process.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.GoingOnline
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short is going online.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.NotConfigured
member.summary: TBD

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.Offline
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short is offline.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.Online
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short is online.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.OnlineCrmNotAvailable
member.summary: Indicates that the pn_microsoftcrm server is not available.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.PostOfflineUpgrade
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short was upgraded while offline.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.SyncToOutlook
member.summary: Indicates that pn_crm_for_outlook_short is currently synchronizing pn_MS_Outlook_Short with pn_microsoftcrm.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.SyncToOutlookError
member.summary: Indicates that there was an error in the last synchronization between pn_MS_Outlook_Short and pn_microsoftcrm.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.ClientState.Unknown
member.summary: TBD

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.OutlookSyncType
member.summary: Contains the possible synchronization type values that can be passed to the method to trigger a background synchronization operation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.OutlookSyncType.AddressBook
member.summary: Indicates that the pn_microsoftcrm Address Book Provider has to be synchronized with the data in pn_microsoftcrm.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.OutlookSyncType.Offline
member.summary: Indicates that the user's offline database has to be synchronized with the data in pn_microsoftcrm.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.OutlookSyncType.Outlook
member.summary: Indicates that the user's pn_MS_Outlook_Short store has to be synchronized with the data in pn_microsoftcrm.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService
member.summary: Provides methods for interacting with pn_crm_for_outlook_short.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.#ctor
member.summary: constructor_initializesCrmOutlookService class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.GoOffline
member.summary: Takes pn_crm_outlook_offline_access into an offline state and triggers a synchronization of the offline database with the online server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.GoOnline
member.summary: Synchronizes pn_crm_outlook_offline_access with the online pn_microsoftcrm server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.SetOffline
member.summary: Sets pn_crm_outlook_offline_access into an offline state without triggering a synchronization of the offline database with the online server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.Sync(Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.OutlookSyncType)
member.summary: Triggers a synchronization event between pn_crm_outlook_offline_access in pn_MS_Outlook_Full and the pn_microsoftcrm server.
member.param: The target to which synchronization needs to be triggered: Outlook, the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Address Book Provider or the Offline database. This parameter is an enumeration type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.IsCrmClientLoaded
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether pn_crm_for_outlook_short is loaded by pn_MS_Outlook_Full.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.IsCrmClientOffline
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether pn_crm_outlook_offline_access is offline.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.IsCrmDesktopClient
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether pn_crm_for_outlook_short is installed. This version has no offline access.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.ServerUri
member.summary: Gets the server URI to use to connect to the pn_microsoftcrm server based on the state of pn_crm_for_outlook_short.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.Outlook.Sdk.CrmOutlookService.State
member.summary: Gets the state of pn_crm_outlook_offline_access.
